name: Re-Authenticate by OTP
description: This API is used to re-authenticate via Multi-factor authentication by passing the One Time Password that the customer possesses.

Get Params.name: smstemplate2fa
Get Params.description: Name of the SMS template you're using to send out the Welcome email of it's applicable.

Post Parameters.name: otp
Post Parameters.description: one-time passcode that the customer received.

Post Parameters.name: securityanswer
Post Parameters.description: Valid JSON object containing the Unique Security Question ID and Answer of the set Security Question. It is only required for locked accounts when logging in. Details about this feature here

Post Parameters.name: qq_captcha_ticket
Post Parameters.description: If CAPTCHA lockout is enabled with QQ, and the user is locked, you must provide the QQ Captcha ticket.

Post Parameters.name: qq_captcha_randstr
Post Parameters.description: If CAPTCHA lockout is enabled with QQ, and the user is locked, pass the value of the user's random string retrieved from the QQ captcha.

Post Parameters.name: g-recaptcha-response
Post Parameters.description: If reCAPTCHA lockout is enabled, You can pass a valid reCAPTCHA value into the API for login if the account was locked after continous n number of unsuccessful login attempts
